ApproxsimClient
Class ApproxsimDialog

java.lang.Object
  ApproxsimClient.ApproxsimDialog

public class ApproxsimDialog
extends Object

This class implements the different dialogs used in APPROXSIM.

Method Detail

showProgressBarDialog

public static void showProgressBarDialog(Frame f,
                                         String info)
This method shows the progress bar dialog.

Parameters:
f - owner of the dialog.
info - the message shown in the dialog.

quitProgressBarDialog

public static void quitProgressBarDialog()
Terminates the progress bar dialog.

showErrorMessageDialog

public static void showErrorMessageDialog(Component parentComponent,
                                          Object message,
                                          String title)
Shows an error message dialog and quits the progress bar dialog if active.

Parameters:
parentComponent - determines the Frame in which the dialog is displayed.
message - the message to display.
title - the title of the dialog.

showWarningMessageDialog

public static void showWarningMessageDialog(Component parentComponent,
                                            Object message,
                                            String title)
Shows a warning message dialog.

Parameters:
parentComponent - determines the Frame in which the dialog is displayed.
message - the message to display.
title - the title of the dialog.

showOptionDialog

public static int showOptionDialog(Component parentComponent,
                                   Object message,
                                   String title,
                                   int optionType,
                                   int messageType,
                                   Icon icon,
                                   Object[] options,
                                   Object initialValue)
Shows an option dialog.

Parameters:
parentComponent - determines the Frame in which the dialog is displayed.
message - the Object to display.
title - the title string for the dialog.
optionType - an integer designating the options available on the dialog: YES_NO_OPTION, or YES_NO_CANCEL_OPTION.
messageType - an integer designating the kind of message this is : ERROR_MESSAGE, INFORMATION_MESSAGE, WARNING_MESSAGE, QUESTION_MESSAGE or PLAIN_MESSAGE.
icon - the icon to display in the dialog.
options - an array of objects indicating the possible choices the user can make.
initialValue - the object that represents the default selection for the dialog; only meaningful if options is used.
Returns:
an integer indicating the option chosen by the user, or CLOSED_OPTION if the user closed the dialog.

showInputDialog

public static String showInputDialog(Component parentComponent,
                                     Object message,
                                     Object initialSelectionValue)
Shows a question-message dialog and quits the progress bar dialog if active.

Parameters:
parentComponent - the parent Component for the dialog.
message - the message to display.
initialSelectionValue - the value used to initialize the input field.

preprocessMessage

public static Object preprocessMessage(Object msg)
Preprocesses a message to be shown in a dialog. If the message is a String it is wrapped inside a JTextArea so that it will be possible to copy the text from the dialog.

Parameters:
msg - The message Obejct to preprocess.
Returns:
The processed message object.
